statements: SELECT * FROM Pseudonymization;
SELECT original_name, pseudonymized_name FROM Pseudonymization;
SELECT * FROM Pseudonymization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT original_name FROM Pseudonymization WHERE pseudonymized_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, original_name, pseudonymized_name FROM Pseudonymization ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT original_name, pseudonymized_name FROM Pseudonymization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Pseudonymization WHERE original_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Pseudonymization WHERE pseudonymized_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT original_name FROM Pseudonymization WHERE pseudonymized_name = 'XXXX';
SELECT id, original_name, pseudonymized_name FROM Pseudonymization WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM pseudonymized_orders WHERE total_amount < 100.00;
SELECT user_id, order_date FROM pseudonymized_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_address FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE pseudonymized_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email FROM pseudonymized_users;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email, pseudonymized_address FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email FROM pseudonymized_users ORDER BY pseudonymized_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE user_id > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, pseudonymized_email, total_amount FROM pseudonymized_users u INNER JOIN pseudonymized_orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pseudonymization_users;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, registration_date FROM pseudonymization_users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, pseudonymized_product, total_amount FROM pseudonymization_orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM pseudonymization_orders GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT product_id, pseudonymized_name, category, price FROM pseudonymization_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_name, registration_date FROM pseudonymization_users
SELECT pseudonymized_product, total_amount, order_date FROM pseudonymization_orders
SELECT product_id, pseudonymized_name, category, price FROM pseudonymization_products
SELECT user_id, pseudonymized_email FROM pseudonymization_users
SELECT order_id, user_id, total_amount FROM pseudonymization_orders
SELECT * FROM pseudonymization_data;
SELECT id, name, email FROM pseudonymization_data;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM pseudonymization_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM pseudonymization_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM pseudonymization_log WHERE action = 'delete';
SELECT * FROM pseudonymization_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM pseudonymization_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM pseudonymization_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(log_id) AS max_log_id FROM pseudonymization_log;
SELECT table_name, COUNT(*) FROM pseudonymization_keys GROUP BY table_name;
SELECT * FROM pseudonymized_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM pseudonymized_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, username FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM pseudonymized_orders WHERE order_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, street_address, postcode FROM pseudonymized_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM pseudonymized_users ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM pseudonymized_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM pseudonymized_addresses ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM pseudonymized_orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING order_count > 2 ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM pseudonymized_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
